title: Scout should be able to submit a new player
custom_preconds: Given I am logged in as a scout
custom_steps:
When I enter required fields in the create new widget, click next
And fill out all required fields on the profile and click submit
custom_expected:
Then I should see successful confirmation message on screen
And player should appear on scouts clipboard and on scout admins clipboard

custom_steps_separated.content: I have access to the create new widget
When I enter required fields in the create new widget, click next
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then I should see successful confirmation message on screen

custom_steps_separated.content: And fill out all required fields on the profile and click submit
custom_steps_separated.expected:
And player should appear on scouts clipboard and on scout admins clipboard
And something else happens

title: Scout should be able to submit a new school
Scout should be able to submit a new report for new player
